name: Reverse Valley
effect:
Choose which way this card faces before you play it. Any damage done to this ↓ player’s {M} Pokémon by an opponent’s attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Choose which way this card faces before you play it. The attacks of this ↓ player’s {D} Pokémon do 10 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
author: 5ban Graphics
